basic_info.description: I'm Salma, a front-end developer passionate about creating web interfaces that are both aesthetic and functional. My experience has allowed me to acquire strong skills in web development, especially in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and using frameworks such as React and Vue. I'm motivated and enthusiastic about collaborating with you to create innovative and quality projects. I invite you to discover my work below, which will give you an overview of my skills and most recent projects. Feel free to contact me to discuss your needs and see how we can work together. Thank you for visiting and see you soon! üëãüèæ

projects.title: E-commerce page
projects.description: This is most advanced project that I have worked on. This project allowed me to use React, which was a real challenge for me.

projects.title: IP Address tracker
projects.description: One of the first projects that I worked on. This one allowed me to put my knowledge of JavaScript into practice.

projects.title: Signup form
projects.description: This is one of the first projects I worked on. It allowed me to put my knowledge of Javascript into practice.

projects.title: Booki | Travel agency
projects.description: Booki is a travel agency that allows users to find accommodations and activities in the city of their choice. This was the first project of my web developer training for which I was tasked with integrating the site's interface using HTML and CSS.

projects.title: Sophia Bluel's portfolio
projects.description: This is the portfolio of an interior architect featuring: the presentation page of the architect's work, the login page for the site administrator, and a modal window for uploading new media.
